titleStmt.title: Elizaes memoriall. King Iames his arriuall. And Romes downefall
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed T[homas] C[reede] for Iohn Baylie, and are to be sold at his shop neare the litle north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: A.N., i.e. Anthony Nixon.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop neare the litle north doore of Paules
